controller

Class PersistenceController

  • Object
    • PersistenceController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckInCheckOutController, EntityController, ReportController, ReservationController

    public abstract class PersistenceController
extends Object
implements Controller
    An abstract base class for all Controller classes that requires access to Persistence API.
    Author:
    YingHao

    • Method Detail

      • getPersistenceImpl

        protected Persistence getPersistenceImpl()
        Gets the Persistence API implementation that was associated with this instance.
        Returns:
        A Persistence implementation.

      • safeOnOptionSelected

        protected abstract void safeOnOptionSelected(View view,
                        int option)
                                      throws Exception
        Subclasses of PersistenceController should implement this method instead of onOptionSelected(View, int). For more information of what is to be implemented, please refer to Controller.onOptionSelected(View, int)
        Parameters:
        view - - A view interface that provides input/output.
        option - - The option that is selected, the option value starts from 0.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • onOptionSelected

        public final void onOptionSelected(View view,
                    int option)
        Subclasses of PersistenceController should implement safeOnOptionSelected(view.View, int) instead. This method has been implemented as a wrapper to catch unhandled exceptions and displaying file operation error to the user.
        Specified by:
        onOptionSelected in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        view - - The view instance that triggered this callback.
        option - - The option that is selected, the option value starts from 0.
